infotexts.entitydescription.scp_largearmykit: A large medical kit designed for use by combat medics out in the field where they will be distant from any sort of intensive care, coming with various tools and chemical compounds to deal with most injuries caused by weapons, however requires a skilled user to utilise properly.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_armykit: A kit specifically designed for dealing with common combat injuries, ergo it's excellent for stabilising most severe physical injuries. Fresh kits have 4 uses, and will heal the target limb.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_surgicalkit: A medical kit containing surgical equipment for dealing with severe wounds and profuse bleeding, though requires a dedicated medic to use as such equipment needs extensive training, otherwise it may cause the patient extreme distress. Fresh kits have 4 uses, and will heal the target limb.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_tourniquet: A device meant to rapidly stop even the most severe bleeding, making it useful in dire scenarios, however using it incorrectly can cause it to be useless.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_healthpills: a plastic bottle containing capsuled pills with a highly experimental powdered mutagenic chemical, remaining in the body for a long period of time and treating most physical and biological abnormalities. Caution must be taken however due to the sheer stress this imparts on the patient's vital structures.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_painkillers: a plastic bottle containing capsuled pills of powdered analgesic, best used for coping with moderate pain. Fresh bottles have 6 uses.
infotexts.entitydescription.sgt_sterilebandage: A bandage in a sealed package with an antimicrobial additive. Particularly effective against many different types of burns and cleaning infected wounds, at the cost of being less effective against bleeding.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_firelatexhot: A sample of Ignis Latex which has been modified to further enhance it's exothermic reaction, causing severe burns within seconds after contact with skin.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_replicatinglatexre: A sample of Preso Latex which has been chemically modified to take advantage of Preso latex's mutagenic properties, directly counteracting any Preso Latex reactions alongside partially inverting celluar atrophy caused by Ionizing Radiation.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_diamorphine: An incredibly potent stimulant, It can be used to treat the most excruciating pain and to a degree flush out chemicals and infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_concoction: A syringe containing a mixture of Morbusine, Radiotoxin and Sufforin, capable of inflicting a horrendous death upon an individual you are especially not fond of in addition to being difficult to remediate. This practice of combining toxins is outlawed due to the intense degree of suffering it causes to an individual.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_vodka: A bottle of high concentration ethanol that should be used in small doses. It's commonly used as a basic remedy for illness and poisoning.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_pomegrenadedrink: A bottle of Pomegrenade juice and Condensed Ethanol, providing an excellent drink for thirsty submariners who want a quick break from something.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_propital: An autoinjector using long lasting Anabolic Steroids and analgesics to boost both tissue regeneration and blood coagulation, making it a prime choice for imminent combat.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_condensedstabilozi: An autoinjector containing Anabolic Steroids and high levels of Stabilozine for use against most poisons and radiation exposure.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_condenseddeusizine: An autoinjector containing Preso Latex and high levels of Deusizine, capable of treating most diseases and severe radiation exposure, though improper use can have drastic consequences.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_adrenaline: An autoinjector comprised of Adrenaline, which is useful for reviving unconscious patients from oxygen deprivation and marginally increasing combat capabilities.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_panacea: A mysterious and near perfect looking capsule that is impossible to open regardless of technique. The chemical inside through an unknown and non-replicable process directly reads from the consumer's genetic information and causes a body-wide 'reset' to abnormal and normal cellular structures, freeing the consumer from any injuries. This works especially well against foreign pathogens such as Prionic, Viral and Bacterial infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_devilsblood: A syringe of processed Sulphuric Acid and Ignis Latex that actively liquefies organic tissues and causes massive internal haemorrhaging. This process as expected is excruciatingly painful and traumatic for the victim.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_wastingdiseasesyri: A syringe containing a poorly understood neurodegenerative prion disease commonly found dormant within various Europan creatures. These prions are activated through stimulating alien blood with Preso Latex and Sufforin.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_wastingdiseasecure: A syringe predominantly containing Stabilozine, capable of neutralising the malignant protein structures responsible for SWD.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_lineavirussyringe: A syringe containing an extremely contagious specimen of airborne and waterborne virus. Using Sufforin and Preso Latex as a potent activating agent, this specimen is ready for use in biological warfare. CBRN protection will be mandatory once this begins to spread.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_lineaviruscure: A syringe predominantly containing Stabilozine and ABX, providing temporary vaccination.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_volatilereplicatin: A highly unstable form of Preso Latex that readily and spotaneously attempts to react with any organic tissue within close proximity of itself. Holding onto this for a long period of time is highly discouraged.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_armory: A large, lockable cabinet for storing large amounts of weaponry.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_railguncabinet: A large cabinet for storing railgun shells.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_ammofabricator: A fabricator specifically designed for creating ammunition for firearms. Its specific calibration allows for faster creation of ammunition.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_weaponfabricator: A fabricator specifically designed for creating most firearms that exist on Europa. Its specific calibration makes it faster at creating firearms.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_portableammofabric: A smaller, more compact fabricator designed and calibrated specifically for ammunition development when a submarine lacks a fabricator or simply for making ammunition without raising as much suspicion. Can be placed using RMB + E.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_portableweaponfabr: A smaller, more compact fabricator designed and calibrated specifically for firearm development on submarines not featuring fabricators, or to simply create weapons without raising as much suspicion. Can be placed using RMB + E.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_advportableweaponf: A compact and top-of-the-line fabricator used in creating both high tier weaponry and ammunition. Can be placed using RMB + E.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_reloadfabricator: A fabricator for reloading spent magazines. Can be placed using RMB + E.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_chemistrystation: A fabricator used for the synthesis of various chemicals, beneficial or otherwise. Due to it's numerous complex components it is incredibly power hungry. Can be placed using RMB + E.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_portablejunctionbo: A smaller, hot-placeable junction box meant for extending submarine power grids. Due to it's size and non-miniaturized components, it's capabilities are limited and more susceptible to overvolting. Can be placed using RMB + E.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_contrabandcontaine: A small hidden compartment meant to be kept away from prying eyes, make sure to put it in a good place that only you know about.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_revolverammobox: A small and convenient means of keeping ammunition for revolvers of various calibres in one place.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_amrammobox: A small box for containing various Anti-Materiel rounds.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_shotgunammobox: A boxy ammunition crate designed to carry large quantities of shotgun ammunition.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_uniammobox: An ammunition crate for simply dumping random ammunition inside of if organisation is currently not a priority.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_grenadeammobox: A secure box for containing 40mm grenades.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_rifleammobox: A heavy and very large box for containing various rifle or SMG magazines.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_weaponcrate: A crate designed for storing firearms and saving storage space.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_ammocrate: A crate designed for storing ammunition and saving storage space.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_alienweaponcrate: A crate designed for storing conventional and alien firearms.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_leadbox: A heavy toolbox lined with thick layers of lead and rubber, designed for safely storing highly reactive chemicals and radioactive materials.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_radartifact: A bizzarely bleached looking artifact, constantly emitting extremely high levels of Ionizing Radiation, making an adequate container a requirement for safe handling.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_toxartifact: A strangely rusted and rotting looking artefact that emits concentrated, spore-like particles into the environment. Probably best not to keep this around for too long.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_duspear: Dense, heavy harpoons made from Depleted Uranium, having lots of impact though has worse range.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_vintagebox: The outside has seen the ages gone by, and deconstructing it may destroy it's contents. Maybe some acid will get through the rusted lock.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_tankcannon: An 80mm large-bore coilgun derived from an existing gun base, meant to act as a stop gap between coilguns and a fully fledged railgun. It packs more punch though has it's own proprietary ammunition and is a lot more power demanding.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_prototankcannon: A heavily modified 80mm cannon meant to further increase it's abilities, firing significantly faster and is more energy efficient. However, this comes at a massive price tag and has very heavy springs.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_tankgunbox: A large and bulky box containing 20 80mm HE shells for use in the Coilcannon, producing a large explosion on impact.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_tankgunapbox: A large and bulky box containing 20 80mm HEAS shells for use in the Coilcannon, meant to piece armour and then explode.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_tankgunphysbox: A large and bulky box containing 20 80mm AP-PH shells for use in the Coilcannon, the projectiles have a significantly higher velocity due to their lightness, though retain excellent explosive and penetrating potential.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_tankgundubox: A large ammo box containing 20 80mm sabot shells using 20mm Depleted Uranium self sharpening Darts, for penetrating straight through most hull designs and causing a large amount of spalling.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_miniguncoilgun: A highly Prototype coilgun utilizing a rotary gun system for an impressive rate of fire, however is very power demanding.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_xm25: A cumbersome but powerful 25x40mm Grenade Launcher that is effective against quickly destroying medium sized groups of unarmoured targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_xm25mag: A 25x40mm magazine with small, high explosive grenades inside.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_mgturret: A relatively cheap MG attached to a coilgun base meant to be used against lightly armoured targets. Due to its conventional loading and firing mechanism, it uses little power aside from the periscope light.
infotexts.entitydescription.sgt_mgturretgatling: An advancement from the standard Machine Gun Turret, it has a notably increased rate of fire, at the slight costs of accuracy and increased power draw.
infotexts.entitydescription.sgt_mgturretgatlinglar: A massive multi-barrel assembly that's able to reach a ludicrous rate of fire, capable of dispensing a wall of bullets with very little effort, though with a long wind-up to get it to speed, and a deep hunger for ammunition.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_mgturretfmjbox: A 250 round box of FMJ cartridges, meant to be used within a sub mounted Machine Gun. Breaks through armor with force.
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_mgturretapbox: A 250 round box of AP cartridges, meant to be used within a sub mounted Machine Gun. Pierces through, rather than breaking armor.
infotexts.entityname.scp_mgturretduplexbox: Machine Gun Turret Duplex Ammo Box
infotexts.entitydescription.scp_mgturretduplexbox: A 250 round box of double-projectile cartridges, meant to be used within a sub mounted Machine Gun. Developed from an old program to increase hit probability, though not too good against armor.
infotexts.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostassas: A Vanguard operation has been located at [location1], likely to use it as a vector for attack at nearby outposts. They are heavily armed and will put up a significant fight against you, extreme preparation is advised as a result.
infotexts.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostassassina: The Vanguard has been successfully neutralized.
infotexts.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostassassin: The Vanguard has been killed despite their intense resistance, the Separatists are going to be furious with this loss. undock to leave the outpost.
infotexts.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostassas: A group of rogue Coalition members have been located at [location1], likely departing from the Coalition to begin illegal item trafficking or other nefarious practices. Killing the leader alongside their men will be beneficial for both the Coalition and the Separatists.
infotexts.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostassassina: The rogue leader has been successfully taken out.
infotexts.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostassassin: The traitorous leader has been taken care of. Undock to leave.
infotexts.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostassas: A cell of Infiltrator operators have been found in [location1], suggesting an imminent ambush on nearby outposts. The Separatists like to keep hush-hush about their existence. Being underequipped for this task is ill-advised.
infotexts.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostassassina: The infiltrator has been successfully taken out.
infotexts.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostassassin: The Infiltrator has been disposed of despite the resistance, the Separatists are going to be unhappy with this. Undock to leave.
infotexts.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostassas: A large group of scavengers have been found in [location1] looking for supplies. Whilst poorly equipped, their numbers may be problematic to deal with. Beheading the top brass of the scavenging operation will easily prevent anyone else from trying in the future.
infotexts.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostassassina: The Scav Leader has been successfully taken out.
infotexts.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostassassin: The Scav Leader has been toppled. Undock to leave.
infotexts.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostassas: A group of pirates have been found in [location1] looking for a place to set up their operations. Removing them from the outpost would be ideal.
infotexts.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostassassina: The Pirate Leader has been successfully neutralized.
infotexts.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostassassin: The Pirate Leader has been killed and the group's plans ruined. Undock to leave.
infotexts.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostassas: A cell of Separatists have decided to begin operations in [location1], as a result of common Coalition attacks they're unlikely to take your presence kindly. It's best to leave them to their business if you want to keep the Separatists on your side.
infotexts.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostassassina: The Separatist advisor has been killed.
infotexts.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostassassin: The advisor overseeing the operation has been killed. Undock to leave.
infotexts.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostassas: A Protectorate operation has been located at [location1], likely here to exterminate an outpost considered lost. They are easily the most well armed individuals on Europa and will attack anyone interfering with their mission. Being underprepared for this is suicide.
infotexts.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostassassina: The Protectorate has been successfully neutralized.
infotexts.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostassassin: The Protectorate has been killed despite their intense resistance, the Coalition is going to be livid with this victory. Undock to leave.
infotexts.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostassas: A Marauder operation has been identified at [location1], presumably preparing a large raid on a Separatist outpost. They are well known for their highly aggressive tactics and will likely assault your submarine. Confront them if you dare to.
infotexts.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostassassina: The Marauder has been successfully neutralized.
infotexts.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostassassin: The Marauder has been killed despite their intense resistance, the Coalition is going to be very unhappy with this victory. Undock to leave the outpost.
infotexts.missiondescription.scp_salvagewrecktsar: The Armourer of [location1] was expecting a shipment of weapons that included a Prototype nuclear weapon, however the submarine was lost at sea. They're willing to pay a hefty sum for the weapon's arrival.
infotexts.missionsuccess.scp_salvagewrecktsar: The Prototype weapon was successfully delivered.
infotexts.missionmessage0.scp_salvagewrecktsar: The weapon is now on board. Bring it to the next station for a decent payout.
infotexts.missiondescription.cargolatexchemicals: A delivery of Preso and Ignis Latex needs to be transported to [location2] for use in munition production. There's [reward] marks if you can get them there.
infotexts.missionsuccess.cargolatexchemicals: The latex has been successfully delivered.
infotexts.dialogattackedbyfriendly: Ow watch it you reckless moron!
Ow the hell did I do you prick?!
What the hell is wrong with you?!
I'm on your side you fucking idiot!
The hell did i do to you?!
SOMEONE HELP ME THIS GUY'S GONE MAD!
What are you doing?! Why are you shooting me?!
What's gotten into you?! Stop trying to kill me!
Hey I'm not the enemy why are you doing this?!
Stop shooting holy goddamn I'm on your side!
infotexts.dialogattackedbyfriendlysecurityresponse: Oh you're in for it now Private Trigger Happy!
Alright you're for it now you damn traitor!
I'M GONNA LAY YOU OUT SUNSHINE!
YOU THINK YOU CAN JUST ASSAULT ME AND GET AWAY WITH IT?!
Get your serial killer ass here right now!
Time for your ass to learn the hard way!
Time to teach you some damn manners!
There's only one good response to this.
That's it I've had enough lip from you!
Okay fuck this you've screwed up big time!
infotexts.dialogenemydown: 'Bout time I got to kill something.
He ain't getting back up after that.
One less horror in the world.
infotexts.dialogcannottreatself: Where the hell all the medical equipment at?!
Doc I need you stat I don't have anything to fix myself up with!
Doc can you do your damn job and help me please?!
Where did we put all the medical equipment?!
Where did all the medical supplies go?!
Ah crap I think we've messed up! Where are any of the medical supplies at?!? I'm doing pretty bad here!
Doc for 3 seconds stop sitting on your ass and help me I need you now!
Can someone at least *try* to help me here?! I'm hurt bad!
infotexts.dialogcannottreatpatient: Fucks sakes I cant treat [name]'s problems we don't have the stuff for it!
Shit! I cant deal with [name]'s injuries I haven't got the tools for this!
Oh man I can't deal with [name]'s injuries I don't have the stuff for this!
Uh oh I can't deal with [name]'s problems!
We really shoulda prepared better, [name]'s injuries are too severe for me to deal with!
infotexts.dialogtargetarrested: Scumbag arrested! How about you don't be an asshole next time.
You're under arrest, I've had enough of your crap.
Have fun in the cuffs after the shitshow you caused.
Thanks for being a dumbass, you only have yourself to blame for this.
In the cuffs you go then for being such a cunt.
You're under arrest, I don't give a fuck about your objections.
You're under arrest, you fucks never learn, do you?
You're under arrest. What's the matter don't like the consquences of your actions?
You're under arrest. You will remain silent regardless of your rights.
infotexts.dialogstealwarning: I saw that asshole, put that shit back right this fucking second!
Put that shit back right this second or I'll arrest you on the spot!
That's not your property, put it back or I'll kick your ass!
You better put that back before I shove my boot up your ass!
Don't you dare think I didn't see that, you give that back right this second!
Hey you vagabond I'm not as blind as you think, your thieving ass better put that back right now!
Hey dickwad, you better put that back or I'll shove my baton up your ass!
You've got 10 fucking seconds to put that back you thieving scumbag!
Hey you put that shit back RIGHT FUCKING NOW!
You don't put that back and I'll arrest you on the spot for theft!
What fuck do you think you're doing?! Put that back right now!
infotexts.dialogdamagewallswarning: WHAT IN THE HELL ARE YOU DOING?! STOP THAT SHIT NOW!
The fuck?! What the hell is possessing you to do that???
infotexts.dialogicespirespotted: Another Ice Spire, these things are a nightmare.
Cap get us away from that ice spire we're drifting really close to it!
Woah shit watch the Ice Spire don't make me shoot the thing!
Getting a little too close to that Ice Spire!
Hey hey we're about to hit a damn Ice Spire get the hell away from it!
Getting FAR TOO CLOSE to that ice spire!
Ugh jeez these Ice Spires are a pain can we not hit them please?
Hey hey get us away from that Ice Spire that'll cut through our hull like no one's business!
WOAH Ice Spire get away from it before it shishkebabs the whole sub!
Too close to another Ice Spire, I really hope this isn't a running theme from now on...
Hey Ice Spire right next to us! I know they're a pain but we really don't have much choice here!
Spire's danger close! Please move the sub or I'm shooting it!
oh COME ON it's another Ice Spire! I don't wanna do this song and dance again for the whole journey!
infotexts.dialogarrestlastwarning: I will not ask you again! Stop right now!
Don't test your luck! This is your last chance!
Last chance before this gets messy for you!
I'll ask once more and once more only, get on the floor!
Get on the fucking floor like the scumbag you are, NOW!
infotexts.dialogcheckstolenitems.criminal: Well if it ain't the talk of the town, let's see what you've decided is yours this time around...
Oh, you, yeah you're getting searched right now I don't care if someone's already done you over...
Well well well if it ain't the local thief, hold still and don't you dare think about moving.
Hey scumbag stop right there, you're being searched and I couldn't care less what objections you have.
Oh hello, looks like you're on the list, hold still...
infotexts.dialogcheckstolenitems.nostolenitems.cri: Well you're clean, I'm still disappointed I didn't get to punch you in the face but, whatever...
Huh, colour me surprised, just don't make anymore trouble and you'll probably be fine... Or maybe you won't be, either way I don't really care.
infotexts.dialogcheckstolenitems.warn: Thought you could try again? Drop that shit right now.
Yeah you're under arrest unless you drop all of that right now, next time I'm just shooting you.
infotexts.dialogcheckstolenitems.holdstill: Hey you aren't going anywhere until I finish, want to look any more suspicious?!
You guilty as hell or have some sort of tic? Stand the fuck still!
Not so fast, I'm not done.
You trying to get arrested? Hold the hell still!
I suggest you stand still lest you make this a search at gunpoint...
infotexts.dialogunidentifiedtargetspotted: What the fuck is that thing I can see through my periscope?!
... The fuck is that thing?-Whatever I'm shooting it.
There's some really weird looking thing outside, I'm shooting it.
Found a target! Not gonna lie I have no idea what it is!
Some bizzare creepy thing's outside the sub!
Unidentified target spotted, lighting it up!
Weird looking thing right on my gun here!
infotexts.orderdialog.findweapon: [name], grab whatever weapon you can find!
infotexts.dialoglowoncoilgunammo: Jesus we're running light on bullets, I've got 1 spare coilgun box then I'm out...
I've got this coilgun box and maybe another somewhere else, that's it...
Gonna have to really consider getting more coilgun ammo, pretty light on it here.
We're really gonna have to start accounting for our ammo a lot more I'm almost completely out of coilgun boxes.
infotexts.loadingscreentip: Vanguard Operators are the mainstay of Separatist raiding parties with their heavy armour and highly capable weaponry, be very well prepared in case you meet any.
Infiltrators are the Separatist's answer to covert operations on Europa, primarily used for assassinations, recon or, as their name states, infiltrating Coalition outposts.
Coalition Assault Rifles used across Europa are chambered in 5.56x45, whereas the Separatist's Assault Rifles use 5.45x39 and 7.62x39.
The Coalition has a wide variety of high quality, precision engineered firearms at their disposal, with production of such weapons significantly increasing as of recent events.

The Separatists primarily arm themselves with more primitive, more easily manufacturable firearms which makes them more readily available, but are overall inferior to their more expensive, precision tooled alternatives.

It is common for both the Coalition and Separatists to heavily arm their offensive and defensive forces when attacking and occupying an outpost, with abandoned outposts tending to be the most heavily armed for thwarting counter attacks.
It is unclear as to when Preso and Ignis Latex were originally synthesized, however their properties have made them favourable in both chemical weapons and processing.
Preso Latex is a synthesized form of Elastin, created via refining the material with Morbusine and can be used to produce medical equipment and Ignis Latex.
Close Quarters Combat is bloody, desperate and often unfair, making it a hellish ordeal to be thrown into without adequate equipment.

Marksman Rifles, despite their highly situational nature are often used to trigger explosive devices from a distance without wasting any other ammunition, they're also used to reliably kill or incapacitate a person or lightly armoured creatures at arms reach.

Surplus firearms can be found all across Europa, being phased out by advanced bolt sealing techniques and state-of-the-art supercavitating ammo once thought to be impossible to create, having very similar velocity and stability in water as they do on land.

Hexa-Nova is an extremely potent nerve agent that is outright banned by both the Coalition and Separatists as a result of it's destructive capabilites and lingering danger, though that won't stop some people from trying.
Thermonuclear weapons are often seen as suicidal to use given their almost impractically large explosive potential, though with a bit of crew coordination it can end a fight in an instant.
Don't get too cocky in combat, all it takes is one bad move and whatever advantages you had can be easily nullified.

Pistols are generally considered inadequate for the vast majority of use cases, however can be better than nothing if for whatever reason your primary is unavailable, or just for simply taking out someone or something that has little armour.

Revolvers are chambered in cartridges that pack significantly more punch than pistols chamber as they're not restricted to conform to a person's hand, though this does put a lot of demand on the user and requires both hands to be on the guns to prevent nasty occurences.
Machine Guns are the prime choice for area-denial, dealing with nests or any scenario that features lots of enemies, they are however very expensive to run ammo wise.
Assault Rifles are the go-to for most situations given their general purpose design, however intermediate cartridges may faulter depending on who or what you're engaging.

Submachine Guns are meant to provide an automatic means of dispensing pistol cartridges, being more favoured against multiple targets as a result, their poor capabilites however raise questions as to if SMGs are inadequate outside of basic self defence.
Prototype Weapons are top secret or lost upgrades to existing designs, requiring Authentication keys in a compatible Fabricator in order to make them.

Battle Rifles are arguably the most suited for combat against most human targets as a result of 7.62x51mm's capabilites against unarmoured and armoured targets alike, however weapons that chamber it are very expensive and/or demanding on the shooter.

Ever since the beginning of the Coalition-Separatist arms race, outposts on both sides have heavily invested in civilian self defence measures and security budgets, making them significantly harder to attack.
The CBRN, Heavy HAZMAT and Liquidator Suit are capable of protecting against chemical and biological weapons, alongside having significant radiation resistance.
Ignis Latex can be used in the Chemical Refinery to bulk process Magnesium and Flash Powder.
Fractal Ruins can occasionally harbour mysterious, vaguely humanoid holdable firearms, their origin unknown and are highly dangerous to use.

Anti-Materiel Rifles are very niche, but very powerful firearms used predominantly against large creatures, submarines or even heavily armoured combatants, their recoil being extremely demanding for almost any user.
Firearms are dangerous, don't underestimate them even with armour.
Fractal Ruins can occasionally harbour mysterious, vaguely humanoid holdable firearms, their origin unknown and are highly dangerous to use.
Ever since the recent arms race against the Coalition and Separatists, firearms and armour systems have become prolific.

The Coalition and Separatists are currently underway with a gigantic arms race in the largest ever attempt to overthrow one or the other since the Separatist's inception. It's very likely this race will escalate into all-out war.
Durasteel is a Super-Alloy comprised of Titanium and Steel. It is primarily used by the Coalition in their armours and projectiles given it's anti-ballistic and penetrating capabilities respectively.
Depleted Fuel is the prime Armour-Piercing choice for Separatist weapons as engineers will have near exclusive access to the material.

Titanium is very commonly used as Armour-Piercing projectiles thanks to it's hardness and relative abundance on Europa, however Durasteel is used to go against even the most heavily armoured individuals.

The Particle Accelerator Cannon is considered a revolutionary or completely insane design to people, utilizing a highly experimental miniaturized particle accelerator to launch Tau Leptons at 1/10th the speed of light.
The Oppressor Battle Rifle is considered by many to be the prime choice for offensive engagements on outposts and submarines, however it's ammunition is incredibly expensive price and resource wise.
Much blood has already been spilt since the start of the Arms Race, with much more likely to be within the not too distant future
Underwater ammunition has taken a quantum leap since the start of the Arms Race, with advanced supercavitating ammunition becoming the norm and having very similar ballistics on both water and land.

Protectorates are the Coalition's foil to the Vanguards, used to heavily defend the Coalition's territory and attack Separatist controlled areas. They are extremely well equipped and are suicide to go against without the best equipment you can get your hands on.
Marauders are Coalition Spec Ops used for sudden attacks or swift counter-attacks, mostly utilizing equipment that allows for effective hit and run tactics.
Humanity has fought with itself for hundreds of thousands of years, in 2462 on Europa it's no different.

It's unclear why firearms from the mid 20th to the early 21st century have been the go-to options for everyone in 2462, given coilgun technology has already been able to be miniaturized into weapons like the harpoon coilgun.

Contorary to some popular beliefs, the Jovian Separatists do not stand behind any communist agenda. This has presumably become popular as a result of them predominantly using Warsaw-Pact firearms from the mid to late 20th century.

Firearms like the Renegade Oppressor Assault Rifle have become highly infamous as the most effective weapons for mutinies and riots due to it's relative simplicity and effective cartridge at close ranges.
Don't underestimate people when in combat, even powerful cartridges might not stop them in their tracks fast enough before they manage to fight back.
Handgun cartridges have very poor armour penetration and perforating capabilities as a result of their low velocities, however tend to deal large amounts of bleeding.
Fighting multiple people at once can be suicide, ensure to have a plan when inside outposts or submarines.
Stun grenades are highly effective at pacifying a large group of people given their short fuse and quick stunning capabilities, remember that when dealing with outposts.
Armour is objectively necessary when in combat, with hard armour vests being commonplace as a result of the proliferation of rifles.

Wrecks can occasionally harbour ruined piles of random equipment that can be salvaged for materials, though if you're lucky, you might hit the motherlode and find weapon cases and crates of ammunition components.
"Ah pity, war is not fair..." - Lev Zotkin
Recklessly charging into an outpost is a recipe for mass casualties as the inhabitants will generally have the upper hand, have a game plan and use a more tactical approach.
Armour is only so effective, with larger and/or AP cartridges remaining a threat to even the heaviest of armours.
The Assault Revolver, whilst using quite an unorthodox and questionably practical cartridge, packs an immense punch and is an ideal weapon for a captain wishing for "the biggest of irons".
When bullets are flying around it is vital you have something to protect you, wear body armour when you know a fight is likely to occur.
From the bloody trenches of World War 1 to the Europan Arms Race of 2462, modern firearms have been a pivotal means of taking power away from people, for better or worse.
"Put that down, it's a prototype!"
"How fucking powerful do you want it?! Yeah good luck security you can't do shit!" - Miles, during very early development of EHA.
Depleted Uranium railgun shells are excellent at penetrating hulls and damaging the insides, though have little to no explosive potential aside from the spalling they produce.
Nuclear weapons such as the Thermonuclear and Nuclear MIRV railgun shells have gained significant notoriety given their intense power, able to destroy most submarines in a single shot.
Firearm projectiles and Grenade fragmentation do very little to the heavily reinforced sub hulls and outpost walls.
The Renegade Anti-Sub launcher is a simple design and favoured by both sides given it's highly modular grenades, from simple Frag and DU anti-wall warheads to Chemical ones.
Some grenades such as the Durasteel Frag and DU Grenade produce Armour Piercing fragmentation, making them excellent choices against armoured defenders.

It's not inherently clear as to why the Vanguard and Infiltrators decided to customize their helmets to look like both canids and felines respectively, however the leading theory is it's to reflect the defining traits of each role.
Si vis pacem, para bellum.

Submachine Guns are generally seen as obsolete as a result of the large stockpile or rifles capable of defeating armour, though their cheapness and decency against the local fauna makes SMGs popular for civilians or crews on a budget.

Surplus weapons are worn, seldom used, but mainly cheap as dirt firearms that originated from the early days of Europan colonization, with some bizzare designs like the Experimental Assault Rifle and Combat Shotgun being highly effective, if unwieldy.

Nuclear weapons have become prolific on both the Separatists and Coalition sides, with the former mainly focussing on Depleted Uranium munitions and so called "Dirty Weapons", whilst the Coalition mainly have immensely powerful direct options.
Vanguard and Infiltrator operators have caused much outrage as a result of their custom built helmets, the Coalition using their animalistic features to demean them for troop morale's sake.
Contraband items such as the baton and crowbar are much better suited for fighting though break very quickly, they're very useful for mugging or dispatching someone you don't like.

The Coilcannon is a relatively popular option for gunners who want a more powerful coilgun, though it's price, low capacity boxes and high power consumption can make it a hard choice, especially on a budget.

Low yield nuclear weapons such as the 40mm nuclear grenade and anti-sub nuke are incredibly heavy and ergo have very poor ballistics, though create a much larger bang than their conventional alternatives.
The MG Turret can be useful for usage in tandem with heavier weapons, dispatching smaller denizens without using more expensive ammunition, or simply being used as a main weapon in a pinch.
Vintage weapons mostly originate off-moon, being brought from visitors before the communications blackout, some are also faction related.
Preso Latex, whilst being not particularly potent in it's aerosol form, lingers the most and is liable to create contaminants from converted corpses.
Devil's Blood works through inhalation or skin contact, spreading through the bloodstream and physically melting the body away, heavy exposure is a death worse than most.
Hexa-Nova acts through forcing rapid cellular atrophy to exposed tissues, the other toxic chemical components burning the skin and creating a nasty necrotic effect.
Preso Latex converts organic tissue through a poorly understood mutagenic interaction between the chemical and animal cells, converted tissue appears to still harbour the victims DNA.
Chemical weapons are an effective option to use against armoured opponents, though are liable to cause heavy collateral if not used correctly.
infotexts.disembarkperkdescription.extrauniforms: Contains extra faction attire to help distinguish the crew, including Fragmentation Suits, and a set for the Captain. Uses Coalition Camo.
infotexts.disembarkperkdescription.extrauniformsre: Contains extra faction attire to help distinguish the crew, including Fragmentation Suits, and a set for the Captain. Uses Separatist Camo.
infotexts.disembarkperkdescription.armorysurplus: Stores additional small surplus firearms, such as Revolvers and SMGs.
infotexts.disembarkperkdescription.armoryheavyarti: Stocks the armory with larger weapons, such as Machine Guns, Grenade Launchers, and Anti-Materiel Rifles. Uses Coalition Arms.
Stocks the armory with larger weapons, such as Machine Guns, Grenade Launchers, and Anti-Sub Launchers. Uses Separatist Arms.
infotexts.disembarkperkdescription.armorysmallren: The armory contains basic weapons, such as Light SMGs, Revolvers, and Handguns. Uses Separatist Arms.
infotexts.disembarkperkdescription.armoryclosequar: The armory contains close quarters weapons, such as Shotguns, Heavy SMGs, and Light Rifles. Uses Separatist Arms.
infotexts.disembarkperkdescription.armoryhighcal: Expands the armory with large caliber weaponry, such as Battle Rifles, Marksman Rifles, and Oppressor Battle Rifles. Uses Coalition Arms.
infotexts.disembarkperkdescription.armoryhighcalre: Expands the armory with large caliber weaponry, such as Battle Rifles, Marksman Rifles, and Oppressor Battle Rifles. Uses Separatist Arms.
infotexts.disembarkperkdescription.armorylightarmo: Supplies with light armor options to help against small arms fire. Uses Coalition patterns.
Supplies with light armor options to help against small arms fire. Uses Separatist patterns.
infotexts.disembarkperkdescription.armoryheavyarmo: Supplies with heavier armors and rigs to help against boarding parties or outpost raids. Uses Coalition patterns.
Supplies with heavier armors and rigs to help against boarding parties or outpost raids. Uses Separatist patterns.
infotexts.disembarkperkdescription.armoryspecops: Contains one set of Marauder and Protectorate, each with their weapons and average combat load.
infotexts.disembarkperkdescription.armoryspecopsse: Contains one set of Infiltrator and Vanguard, each with their weapons and average combat load.
infotexts.disembarkperkdescription.experiencepoint: Crew members start with an additional 10 points to all skills
Crew members start with an additional 20 points to all skills
Crew members start with an additional 40 points to all skills
